name: Jaffa Pearl's Pirates
description:
This is my first crack at making a game!

It was inspired by the Civilization 6 Pirates Game mode where I wanted to have ship battles in real time rather than turn based. This is the result after 3 months of learning.

The game consists of 4 levels where you try to achive the highest score possible by defeating enemy ships and collecting the treasure they drop.

I built this as I was learning and as a result it has reached this stage and I am ready to start something else.

https://ko-fi.com/jaffapearl If you would like to suport me.

Thanks for checking out my game!
